original_text:
Little Bighorn
La storia dei conflitti tra gli indiani d’America e l’esercito degli Stati Uniti è lunga, ma una più di altre è rimasta impressa nei libri di storia, quella di Little Bighorn, quando i Sioux riuscirono a sconfiggere la temibile compagnia del colonnello George Armstrong Custer.
La slot della software house Nolimit City rende onore a questo pezzo di storia americana con questa slot dalla grafica incredibile, ricca di animazioni e con una colonna sonora dal tono epico che ci farà emozionare a ogni Spin.
Una griglia inusuale
In Little Bighorn troviamo una griglia di gioco con 5 rulli e un numero di righe variabile (3 – 4 – 5 – 3 – 2). La scommessa base è di 0,20 € e i modi per vincere sono 360, con una vincita potenziale di 23.676 volte la puntata. Vengono considerate combo vincenti quelle composte da almeno tre simboli identici a partire dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
I giri automatici ci permettono di giocare senza dover ogni volta cliccare il tasto Play e grazie ai limiti di vincita e di perdita non dobbiamo preoccuparci di nulla.
La volatilità è alta, il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è pari al 96,06%, che valore che varia quando affrontiamo i giochi bonus.
Tanti Bonus per vincite super
A differenza di tante altre slot, in Little Bighorn non troviamo i simboli delle carte da gioco, ma solo quelli tematici. Quelli di minor valore sono il coltello, la colt, la mazza, il fucile e l’ascia. A seguire abbiamo i simboli maggiormente remunerativi: Due Lune, capitano Thomas Custer, Cavallo Pazzo, colonnello George Cluster e Toro Seduto.
Abbiamo diversi simboli Wild e Scatter, ognuno con una funzione diversa. La scritta Wild è il nostro Jolly classico e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali.
C’è poi lo Scalp Wild, che può atterrare solo sul rullo tre e che trasforma tutti i soldati americani in Jolly. Inoltre, si espande per tutto il rullo. Per ogni americano scalpato, si otterrà un moltiplicatore +1.
L’altro simbolo speciale è il Totem Wild, anch’esso a espansione. Se compare 3 volte, assegna 8 Free Spins.
Con il simbolo No Mercy Scatter si attiva una funzione speciale. Il simbolo No Mercy Scatter si sposta sulla sinistra, rivelando uno dei seguenti simboli speciali:

Toro seduto: trasforma i suoi simboli in Wild espandibili
Cavallo Pazzo: trasforma i suoi simboli in Wild e aggiunge un moltiplicatore +1 a ogni suo simbolo
Due Lune: trasforma tutti i suoi simboli in Wild

Le funzioni speciali possono anche essere acquistate cliccando sul simbolo della stella.

Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare anche sul telefonino a Little Bighorn?

Certo, questa slot è fruibile da qualsiasi dispositivi.



Qual è la vincita massima?

Con Little Bighorn potete aspirare a vincere fino a 23.676 volte la puntata!



Quasi sono i modi per vincere in Little Bighorn?

I modi per vincere sono 360.

raw_translation.response:
Little Bighorn
The tale of conflict between Native Americans and the United States Army is a long one, but few are as iconic as that of Little Bighorn, when the Sioux defeated the formidable company of Colonel George Armstrong Custer. Nolimit City's slot game pays homage to this piece of American history with incredible graphics, rich animations, and an epic soundtrack that will thrill every spin for experienced gamblers.

An Unusual Grid
In Little Bighorn, we find a game grid with 5 reels and a variable number of rows (3-4-5-3-2). The base bet is €0.20 and the ways to win are 360, with a potential win of 23,676 times the bet. Winning combos are those composed of at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. The automatic spins allow us to play without having to click the Play button every time, and thanks to the win and loss limits, we don't have to worry about anything. The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.06%, a value that varies when playing bonus games.

Many Bonuses for Super Wins
Unlike many other slot games, Little Bighorn does not feature playing card symbols, but only thematic ones. The lower value symbols are the knife, gun, mace, rifle, and ax. Following these, we have the more lucrative symbols: Two Moons, Captain Thomas Custer, Crazy Horse, Colonel George Custer, and Sitting Bull. We have several Wild and Scatter symbols, each with a different function. The Wild symbol is our classic Joker and replaces all symbols except the special ones.

Then there is the Scalp Wild, which can only land on the third reel and turns all American soldiers into Jokers. Furthermore, it expands to the entire reel. For every American scalp obtained, a +1 multiplier is awarded. The other special symbol is the Totem Wild, also expanding. If it appears 3 times, it awards 8 Free Spins. With the No Mercy Scatter symbol, a special function is activated. The No Mercy Scatter symbol moves to the left, revealing one of the following special symbols:

Sitting Bull: turns its symbols into expanding Wilds
Crazy Horse: turns its symbols into Wilds and adds a +1 multiplier to each symbol
Two Moons: turns all its symbols into Wilds

Special functions can also be purchased by clicking on the star symbol.

FAQs
Can I also play Little Bighorn on my mobile phone?

Of course, this slot is available on any device.

What is the maximum win?

With Little Bighorn, you can aspire to win up to 23,676 times your bet!

How many ways to win are there in Little Bighorn?

There are 360 ways to win in Little Bighorn.

raw_translation.response:
Little Bighorn: A Slot Game That Honors the Legacy of Sioux Victory

As an experienced gambler, you know that some historical moments shake the world. Little Bighorn is definitely one of them. The Nolimit City software house did an outstanding job with this slot game. The graphics are stunning, full of animations and epic sound effects that will make your heart race with every spin.

Unusual Grid, Many Chances To Win!

Little Bighorn surprises you with a grid of 5 reels and a variable number of rows (3-4-5-3-2). The starting bet is €0.20, and there are 360 ways to win with a potential maximum payout of 23,676 times your bet. Winning combinations start from the leftmost reel and proceed towards the right. Notably, the slot includes automatic play options that enable you to avoid the wearisome manual spinning.

High Volatility and RTP

The slot has high volatility, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.06%, a value that changes when engaging with the bonus games. You don't need to worry about winning or losing too much. The game has strict limits you won't surpass.

Wild, Scalp Wild, Totem Wild, and More!

In Little Bighorn, you won't find any ordinary playing cards but only theme-related symbols. These symbols range from a knife, colt, club, rifle, and ax to two moons, Captain Thomas Custer, Crazy Horse, Colonel George Cluster, and Sitting Bull. The game features numerous Wild and Scatter symbols, each with a different feature and function.

Specifically, the Wild symbol, also known as the joker, can substitute all other symbols except the special ones. The Scalp Wild symbol appears only on the third reel and turns all American soldiers into Joker symbols, expanding throughout the reel. For every scalp, players get a +1 multiplier.

The Totem Wild expands and triggers eight free spins when it appears three times. The No Mercy Scatter symbol acts as a gateway to a special feature. The No Mercy Scatter symbol moves left, revealing one of the following special symbols:

- Sitting Bull: turns all Sitting Bull symbols into expanding Wilds
- Crazy Horse: turns all Crazy Horse symbols into Wilds and adds a +1 multiplier to each symbol
- Two Moons: turns all Two Moons symbols into Wilds


Frequently Asked Questions

Can I play Little Bighorn on my mobile device?

Absolutely. This slot game is playable on any device.

What is the maximum payout?

With Little Bighorn, you have the chance to win up to 23,676 times your bet.


How many ways to win are there in Little Bighorn?

There are 360 ways to win in Little Bighorn.

Review: Little Bighorn
The tale of conflict between Native Americans and the United States Army is a long one, but few are as iconic as that of Little Bighorn, when the Sioux defeated the formidable company of Colonel George Armstrong Custer. Nolimit City's slot game pays homage to this piece of American history with incredible graphics, rich animations, and an epic soundtrack that will thrill every spin for experienced gamblers.

An Unusual Grid
In Little Bighorn, we find a game grid with 5 reels and a variable number of rows (3-4-5-3-2). The base bet is €0.20 and the ways to win are 360, with a potential win of 23,676 times the bet. Winning combos are those composed of at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. The automatic spins allow us to play without having to click the Play button every time, and thanks to the win and loss limits, we don't have to worry about anything. The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.06%, a value that varies when playing bonus games.

Many Bonuses for Super Wins
Unlike many other slot games, Little Bighorn does not feature playing card symbols, but only thematic ones. The lower value symbols are the knife, gun, mace, rifle, and ax. Following these, we have the more lucrative symbols: Two Moons, Captain Thomas Custer, Crazy Horse, Colonel George Custer, and Sitting Bull. We have several Wild and Scatter symbols, each with a different function. The Wild symbol is our classic Joker and replaces all symbols except the special ones.

Then there is the Scalp Wild, which can only land on the third reel and turns all American soldiers into Jokers. Furthermore, it expands to the entire reel. For every American scalp obtained, a +1 multiplier is awarded. The other special symbol is the Totem Wild, also expanding. If it appears 3 times, it awards 8 Free Spins. With the No Mercy Scatter symbol, a special function is activated. The No Mercy Scatter symbol moves to the left, revealing one of the following special symbols:

Sitting Bull: turns its symbols into expanding Wilds
Crazy Horse: turns its symbols into Wilds and adds a +1 multiplier to each symbol
Two Moons: turns all its symbols into Wilds

Special functions can also be purchased by clicking on the star symbol.

FAQs
Can I also play Little Bighorn on my mobile phone?

Of course, this slot is available on any device.

What is the maximum win?

With Little Bighorn, you can aspire to win up to 23,676 times your bet!

How many ways to win are there in Little Bighorn?

There are 360 ways to win in Little Bighorn.

meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Little Bighorn".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Unusual Grid and High Volatility Provide Thrills

Little Bighorn boasts an unusual game grid with 5 reels and a variable number of rows (3-4-5-3-2). The base bet is €0.20 and the ways to win are 360, with a potential win of 23,676 times the bet. Winning combos are those composed of at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. With high volatility, gamblers can expect an exciting and unpredictable experience, supported by a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 96.06%.

Thematic Symbols and Special Features

Little Bighorn only offers thematic symbols to create winning combinations, such as the knife, gun, mace, rifle, and ax. The higher paying symbols are real historical figures, including Captain Thomas Custer, Colonel George Custer, Crazy Horse, Sitting Bull, and Two Moons. In addition to the classic Joker Wild symbol, players can also take advantage of special symbols. The Scalp Wild turns all American soldiers into Jokers when it lands on the third reel, and expands to the entire reel. The Totem Wild also expands, and if it appears three times, it awards 8 free spins. The No Mercy Scatter symbol activates unique functions for Sitting Bull, Crazy Horse, or Two Moons. These special features can also be purchased by clicking on the star symbol.

Rewarding Bonuses for Players

Little Bighorn offers an exciting range of bonuses and rewards for players. The Scalp Wild adds a +1 multiplier for every American scalp obtained, meaning big payouts are possible. The Totem Wild awards 8 free spins when it appears three times, offering more chances for players to win big. The No Mercy Scatter symbol activates special functions for Sitting Bull, Crazy Horse, or Two Moons. Finally, players can also purchase special features by clicking on the star symbol.

Thematic Design and High RTP

Little Bighorn's thematic design creates an immersive experience for players. The graphics, animations, and epic soundtrack all pay homage to the conflict between Native Americans and the United States Army. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.06%, which is a solid value for gamblers looking for a high potential payout. However, it's important to note that the RTP varies when playing bonus games and features.

Mobile Compatibility for On-the-Go Gaming

Little Bighorn is available to play on any device, with mobile compatibility allowing for on-the-go gaming. This means that players can access the exciting gameplay and features from anywhere, anytime. Whether on a smartphone or tablet, the graphics and animations remain top-notch, providing a thrilling slot game experience.

    "pros": [
        "Unusual grid with high volatility for an exciting experience",
        "Thematic symbols and special features add more variety to gameplay",
        "Exciting range of bonuses and rewards for players",
        "Mobile compatibility for on-the-go gaming"
    ],
    "cons": [
        "RTP varies when playing bonus games and features",
        "No low-paying symbols may not appeal to some players"
    ],
    "meta_title": "Play Little Bighorn for Free: Unusual Grid with High Volatility",
    "meta_description": "Read our review of Little Bighorn, an online slot game with an unusual grid and high volatility. Play for free and experience the excitement!" 
}

faq.question: What is the Scalp Wild symbol in Little Bighorn?
faq.answer: The Scalp Wild can only land on the third reel and turns all American soldiers into Jokers. It expands to the entire reel and can award a +1 multiplier for every American scalp obtained.

faq.question: What is the Totem Wild symbol in Little Bighorn?
faq.answer: The Totem Wild symbol also expands and awards 8 Free Spins if it appears 3 times.

faq.question: What is the No Mercy Scatter symbol in Little Bighorn?
faq.answer: The No Mercy Scatter symbol moves to the left and reveals one of the following special symbols: Sitting Bull, Crazy Horse, or Two Moons.

faq.question: Can I purchase special functions in Little Bighorn?
faq.answer: Yes, you can purchase special functions by clicking on the star symbol.

faq.question: Which symbols are higher value in Little Bighorn?
faq.answer: The more lucrative symbols are Two Moons, Captain Thomas Custer, Crazy Horse, Colonel George Custer, and Sitting Bull.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Little Bighorn".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Little Bighorn
The tale of conflict between Native Americans and the United States Army is a long one, but few are as iconic as that of Little Bighorn, when the Sioux defeated the formidable company of Colonel George Armstrong Custer. Nolimit City's slot game pays homage to this piece of American history with incredible graphics, rich animations, and an epic soundtrack that will thrill every spin for experienced gamblers.

An Unusual Grid
In Little Bighorn, we find a game grid with 5 reels and a variable number of rows (3-4-5-3-2). The base bet is €0.20 and the ways to win are 360, with a potential win of 23,676 times the bet. Winning combos are those composed of at least three identical symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. The automatic spins allow us to play without having to click the Play button every time, and thanks to the win and loss limits, we don't have to worry about anything. The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.06%, a value that varies when playing bonus games.

Many Bonuses for Super Wins
Unlike many other slot games, Little Bighorn does not feature playing card symbols, but only thematic ones. The lower value symbols are the knife, gun, mace, rifle, and ax. Following these, we have the more lucrative symbols: Two Moons, Captain Thomas Custer, Crazy Horse, Colonel George Custer, and Sitting Bull. We have several Wild and Scatter symbols, each with a different function. The Wild symbol is our classic Joker and replaces all symbols except the special ones.

Then there is the Scalp Wild, which can only land on the third reel and turns all American soldiers into Jokers. Furthermore, it expands to the entire reel. For every American scalp obtained, a +1 multiplier is awarded. The other special symbol is the Totem Wild, also expanding. If it appears 3 times, it awards 8 Free Spins. With the No Mercy Scatter symbol, a special function is activated. The No Mercy Scatter symbol moves to the left, revealing one of the following special symbols:

Sitting Bull: turns its symbols into expanding Wilds
Crazy Horse: turns its symbols into Wilds and adds a +1 multiplier to each symbol
Two Moons: turns all its symbols into Wilds

Special functions can also be purchased by clicking on the star symbol.

FAQs
Can I also play Little Bighorn on my mobile phone?

Of course, this slot is available on any device.

What is the maximum win?

With Little Bighorn, you can aspire to win up to 23,676 times your bet!

How many ways to win are there in Little Bighorn?

There are 360 ways to win in Little Bighorn.

dalle-prompt.response:
Prompt: 
Create a cartoon style feature image for Little Bighorn that features a happy Maya warrior with glasses. The image should be eye-catching and include elements of Native American culture as well as the game's theme of conflict between Native Americans and the US Army. The warrior should be celebrating a big win and holding a jackpot prize symbol while also incorporating the game's logo and the phrase "Big Wins at Little Bighorn". The color scheme should be vibrant with warm, earthy tones and include graphics or symbols related to the game's features and bonuses.
